summary: TAKATA RECALL. I KNOW TAKATA WENT BANKRUPT & SOLD TO KEY SAFETY SYSTEMS RECENTLY JUNE2017. PLEASE LET US KNOW WHEN & WHERE WE CAN GET THIS RECALL TAKEN CARE OF.
